name: mirrAR
author: mirrAR.com

sections.description:
We, at mirrAR, are creating new-age shopping experiences. We have built the world’s first real-time Augmented Reality (AR) tech platform that lets shoppers virtually try-on jewellery without physically wearing it before making a purchase. This has helped jewellers sell products without even having physical inventory & creating a unique & immersive experience for their customers, both online & offline.

Shoppers can virtually try-on jewellery through mirrAR at your store via our in-store solution and have a contactless selection & try-on before making the final purchase. For online customers, you can enable virtual try-ons for your jewellery on their laptops/mobile phones so that they can experience virtual try-ons from the comfort of their homes.

mirrAR is one of the very few companies to have markerless hand tracking in an augmented reality application through which customers can try-on rings, bracelets, & watches virtually. We believe this will further bring us closer to revolutionizing jewellery shopping experience, especially in the contactless world, where virtual try-ons are becoming the new normal.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘mirrar’ folder to the directory ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You can adjust the necessary settings using your WordPress admin panel in ‘mirrAR’.
sections.faq:
How to use the plugin?

  1. Upload the ‘mirrar’ folder to the directory ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You can adjust the necessary settings using your WordPress admin panel in ‘mirrAR’.

How to enable / disable button on particular product?

In product data section user get mirrar button section and by clicking on enable / disable checkbox option user can hide / show button on shop page and shop single page.

How to get Brand Id?

User can get brand id from here.

How to use Shortcode?

Use the following shortcodes in your posts or pages:

[mirrar_btn_show post_id=’12’] to display the Mirrar preview button for the product with porduct ID 12.
[mirrar_btn_show post_id=’25’ sku=’custom_sku’] to display the Mirrar preview button for the variant with SKU is your product SKU and product ID is 25.
sections.changelog:
2.1.1

  • Updated plugin description to explain shortcode uses.

2.1

  • SKU attribute added in shortcode for different SKUs for variants.
  • Bug fixing and performance improvement.

2.0

  • Add additional settings on plugin manage page to add mirrAR button on specific class and custom CSS on button.
  • Shortcode added to display mirrAR button on any page.
  • Custom post types supports enable to display mirrAR button on any post type.
  • Automatically added custom metabox for SKU and brand id, when using non WooCommerce product post type.
  • Bug fixing and performance improvement.

1.2.2

  • No Improvement

1.2.1

  • Update logo

1.2

  • Bug fixing and performance improvement.
  • Update banner

1.1.2

  • Bug fixing and performance improvement.

1.1.1

  • Custom SKU added on sync all products.

1.1.0

  • Add product synchornize feature.
  • New option to add custom SKU & brand id for each product.
  • Screenshots updated.

1.0.0

  • Initial version.

screenshots.caption: Mirrar button show on shop page.
Mirrar button show on shop single page.
By clicking on mirrar plugin button user can virtually try-on jewellery without physically wearing it before making a purchase.
Additional settings to display and manage mirrAR button style and position.
